name: Werewolf: Spooky Nights FREE
description:
## FREE VERSION WITH ADS ##

The werewolf game, the famous party card game is released as iOS app!

Werewolf is a classic party game, you only need one copy of the app and a single iPhone or iPod touch for the entire party!

With Werewolf: Spooky Nights no moderator is needed! Just gather your friends and play the famous Werewolf party game just with one device!

Your device acts as moderator.

Every night a player will be eaten by the werewolves,

Villagers have to find the werewolves before its too late!

Can you find the werewolves with your technical talk, deep insight, and reasoning?
